Indian Economy.title: Today in Politics: What will PM Modi’s 12th Independence Day speech focus on?
Indian Economy.summary: In the centrepiece annual event, the PM is expected to lay out his government’s agenda, present its report card, make important policy and programme announcements

Indian Economy.title: Express View on PM Modi’s Independence Day speech: Hope, not fear
Indian Economy.summary: PM’s call for reform and self-reliance struck the right note; the spectre of the ‘intruder’ one of disquiet

Indian Economy.title: India deserves an even higher rating
Indian Economy.summary: India’s sovereign rating of BBB after the upgrade is still just two notches above speculative grade. This does not reflect India’s strengths as a growing economy with sound institutions

Indian Economy.title: Mint Quick Edit | India’s S&P upgrade: Better late than never
Indian Economy.summary: India’s sovereign credit rating has been raised by Standard & Poor’s just as we face trade headwinds. The reasoning is sound, even if it’s a belated nod to the Centre’s public debt control.

Indian Economy.title: Why the plastics treaty negotiations failed again
Indian Economy.summary: Negotiations in Geneva for a historic global treaty to end plastic pollution have ended in failure. Deep divisions over key provisions, including production cuts and legal compliance, highlight ongoing challenges and differing priorities among nations.

Stock Market.title: Gold, silver outshine equity markets amid global uncertainty
Stock Market.summary: Strong central bank purchases, totaling 415 tonnes in H1 2025, and ongoing geopolitical tensions, including the Russia-Ukraine and Israel-Iran conflicts, have bolstered gold demand

Startups & Funding.title: NRT in talks to raise ₹450-crore Series B round from Cornerstone Ventures, others
Startups & Funding.summary: Founded in April 2017 by Sameer Joshi and Julius Amrit, NRT is currently raising a  ₹267-crore bridge round, with about  ₹140 crore already subscribed by existing investors.

Startups & Funding.title: IIT-M incubated Mindgrove expects commercial launch of Secure IoT chips in six months
Startups & Funding.summary: Founded in 2021, the company claims that Secure IoT is India’s first commercial-grade high-performance microcontroller System-on-Chip (SoC) taped out at 28nm

Banking & Finance.title: Independence Day 2025 Share Market Holiday: Are NSE and BSE open or closed today, August 15?
Banking & Finance.summary: India Stock Market Holiday on August 15, 2025: Indian stock markets, including the NSE and BSE, will be observing a closure today, Friday, August 14, 2025, on the occasion of Independence Day in India.

Banking & Finance.title: Banks to balance AI vs privacy following RBI’s call for AI framework
Banking & Finance.summary: Experts say data collection and continuous consent will be the biggest challenge for companies

Banking & Finance.title: Liquidity framework can be fine-tuned
Banking & Finance.summary: Money matters. The RBI working group on liquidity management could consider slight changes in CRR compliance and VRRR norms

Banking & Finance.title: Losing hope on statehood… This dual system built for failure’: In first I-Day speech, Omar takes on Centre
Banking & Finance.summary: Talks about his govt decisions stuck with the Raj Bhavan, regrets Supreme Court remarks regarding Pahalgam attack being a factor in restoration of J&K statehood. “Just trust us once,” says the J&K CM

Banking & Finance.title: How Sovereign Gold Bonds turned into wealth multipliers for investors
Banking & Finance.summary: Sovereign Gold Bond (SGB) series have generated over 100 per cent returns for investors. Nine matured series recently completed their eight-year tenure, delivering XIRR returns between 12.6 per cent and 19 per cent including interest payouts.

Technology Sector.title: 65 and counting: Why assessing toll of Kishtwar cloudburst is proving difficult
Technology Sector.summary: ‘One of the witnesses said there were around 200 pilgrims near the langar when it was swept away’

Technology Sector.title: Independence Day 2025 Share Market Holiday: Are NSE and BSE open or closed today, August 15?
Technology Sector.summary: India Stock Market Holiday on August 15, 2025: Indian stock markets, including the NSE and BSE, will be observing a closure today, Friday, August 14, 2025, on the occasion of Independence Day in India.

Technology Sector.title: Actor, who worked with Amitabh Bachchan and Sridevi, was not at peace with fame and left the industry at the peak of his career
Technology Sector.summary: Mangal Dhillon was one of the most prominent television actors of his time, known for iconic serials like Buniyaad, Junoon, and Noorjahan. At the peak of his career, he was also among the highest-paid actors on Indian television.

Technology Sector.title: ‘Tech for good ideas’ are fine, but it is impact at scale that matters: Anjali Bansal, founder, Avaana Capital
Technology Sector.summary: Anjali spoke to indianexpress.com about tech for good, the need for impact at scale, startups that are making an impact, and the big problems that need to be solved.

Technology Sector.title: Top 10 countries of origin of foreign-born billionaires in the US (2025): India surpasses Israel
Technology Sector.summary: Top 10 countries of origin for America’s foreign-born billionaires 2025 list: The number of Indian-born billionaires in America has jumped from 5 in 2022 to 12 in 2025.
